name: Automutaton
description:
Control a robot with the ability to shape-shift into three unique forms, can you complete all of the levels?

Three unique robots

Use the abilities of three unique robots to overcome challenges 

35 levels

Sure it's not that many, but level design is hard and I'm lazy.

Wait am I allowed to break the fourth wall in the description of the game?

Controls

A & D to move side to side, Spacebar to use the robot's ability.

R to reset the level.

(also has controller support but I don't know which controller you're using.  You should be able to figue it out? I believe in you <3)

Credits:

Touhou soundfont - Team Shanghai Alice

Fountain Lever sfx - felipelnv
